summary.para: Notifies the application when a playback event occurs.

param.name: event
param.para: A member of the enumeration that specifies the event.

param.name: param1
param.para: The first event parameter. The meaning of this parameter depends on the event code.

param.name: param2
param.para: The second event parameter. The meaning of this parameter depends on the event code.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: To set the callback pointer on the Media Engine, set the MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_CALLBACK attribute in the method.
